name: surfize
description:
lo-fi game inspired on the grindcore sounds. Beat your score by killing crazy creatures.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • One life gameplay
  • Fast and thrilling
  • No tutorials! discover it by yourself
  • Old school but polished gameplay to the max
  • Variety of weapons
  • Beat your record

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You will get early access to the game and all the future updates and contribute to the game development.
